entry.title: One Shall Stand
entry.summary:
Author: CreeperSpockJr (1stBorn_RalphSpockJr)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,186Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: On November 17, 1982, a Prophet of the Lord by the name of James Shooter and his psychic friend Robert Budiansky were struck by visions of an apocalyptic battle between two factions of mechanical Titans destroying our planet, and an ancient evil rising from the depths of darkness. Two years passed and the dreams continued, prompting them to write everything down. Their dreams became stories and those stories became one of the most successful franchises to ever exist. A tale of Autobots and Decepticons and the war for planet Earth and the human allies that turned the tide. Human allies that bore the name Witwicky. But what if I told you that that was never their true name? That the name Witwicky was a fiction woven within the truth. What if I told you the true names of these Earthly allies were Winchester‚Ä¶ and Stilinski?

entry.title: Of A Butterfly's Wings
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 131,428Chapters: 82/?Kudos: 244

Summary: Klaus had expected to be done with life after sacrificing himself. He was sure that he could finally rest and be done with it. But, much to his dismay, an otherworldly being had other plans, due to finding Klaus as a source of entertainment.In snatching away his desired death, Klaus Mikaelson was reincarnated into another world as a young magic caster named Stiles Stilinski. With no choice but to live, Klaus decides to use this opportunity to take over Beacon Hills and make it his kingdom.And maybe one day, he'll be strong enough to find a way back home to his world.

entry.title: Same But Different
entry.summary:
Author: Reiko009

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,462Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 15

Summary: ‚ÄúLet me help, love.‚Äù Peter pulled away, which made Derek almost whimper at the loss of contact. The new pet name was only used when they were alone like this. Somehow the word was both too weak to describe what their coupling actually meant and a far more intimate endearment than what Derek felt that he deserved. What they were doing wasn‚Äôt love so much as need ‚Äì just with some added feelings bleeding through. He could sense his wolf curling protectively around what belonged to him, what anchored him, and what strengthened him as the Alpha. True, his pack was small: just him and Peter. But that was enough ‚Äì for now. A spicey reimagining of Season 2 where sex is the answer to Peter finding forgiveness and to keeping Derek sane as a new Alpha. Old foes and a new threat emerge, all while the Hale wolves begin to fall for a very human high schooler with deep brown eyes and a loud mouth. Expect a lot of familiar plot points from the canon, just with a twist. Mostly an excuse to write uncle/nephew werewolf smut.

Blood and swords and scandals and bathhouses and togas, oh my. entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 892,032Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Are you living or just surviving? Eden Parker was just your average human boy. The type who goes to school and steers clear of trouble. That is, until hidden memories are awakened and secrets are revealed. Follow Eden on his rocky journey through the supernatural world, finding his soulmates, and the return of his long lost older brother. entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 461,980Chapters: 40/40Kudos: 1,087

Summary: ‚ÄúHave you ever heard of the butterfly effect?‚Äù Stiles looked up and shook his head. ‚ÄúNo‚Ä¶ what is it?‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it‚Äôs wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.‚Äù He nodded, that‚Äôs exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place‚Ä¶ then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‚Äòcaution‚Äô isn‚Äôt in his vocabulary. ~~~ SEASON TWO IS DONE, THIS FIC WILL RETURN SOON FOR SEASON THREE <3

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 322,038Chapters: 22/24Kudos: 1,509

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from killing his friends. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near). When Stiles goes into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Each night brings new suffering, and each day they have only each other. The two will have to learn how to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they‚Äôll have to work together to escape. Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,421Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 685

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching. ¬† Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him? ¬† *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,843Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 76

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,643Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 21

Summary: In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words.Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.
